description:
uDix is a landing page and marketing website UI Kit created for busy freelancers, product owners, and designers. The product was created based on our 5+ years of experience working on marketing websites and landing pages project. Made of components & instances. Crafted with attention to naming and constraints.


Full Preview ‚Ä¢ About Template


This template is simple, easy to mix, and every single page styled for the best user experience & growth conversion. We also plan to have more updates in a few further months, you can check the roadmap and updates section below.


What's inside?

  • Helps to design responsive landings in Figma
  • 250+ constrained components & well-crafted UI widgets
  • 30+ frequent and reusable templates for mobileüì± and desktopüíª
  • Powered by free Montserrat and Raleway fonts
  • Equipped with adjustable global text & color styles
  • Organized and labeled for a faster workflow

Designers,

skip creating from scratch those boring UI items along with a project. Use uDix UI Kit to concentrate on the prototyping, not on pixel routine
